ControlType.DataSourceTypeName: select empl_code id,empl_name name,'' oth,spell_code,wb_code,'' memo from com_employee where empl_type = 'F'

QueryDataSource.Name: dtBalanceData
QueryDataSource.Sql: select (case when t.waste_flag = '1' and t.trans_type = '1' then t.invoice_no when t.waste_flag = '0' and t.trans_type = '1' then '[退费]'||t.invoice_no when t.waste_flag = '0' and t.trans_type = '2' then '[退费]'||t.invoice_no else '[未知]'||t.invoice_no end) invoice_no, t.name, fm.card_no, fm.patient_no, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type） hj, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '01') xyf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '02') zyf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '03') cwf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '04') zcf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '05') jcf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '06') jyf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '07') zlf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '08') ssf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '09') mzf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '10') hlf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '11') clf, (select nvl(sum(nvl(a.pub_cost,0)+ nvl(a.own_cost,0) + nvl(a.pay_cost , 0)),0) from fin_ipb_balancelist a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.stat_code = '12') qtf, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'CA') ca, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'CH') ch, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'CI') ci, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'PO') po, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'UP') pos, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'WP') WP, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'ZB') zb, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'YE') ye, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'YS') ys, (select a.empower_name from fin_opb_accountrecord a inner join fin_ipb_balancepay b on a.account_no=b.pay_accountno and a.pay_invoiceno=b.invoice_no and b.pay_way='YS' and a.type_code=b.pay_accounttype and a.base_money=-b.cost where t.invoice_no=b.invoice_no and t.balance_no=b.balance_no ) zhm, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'DC') dc, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'PR') pr, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'PY') py, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'PD') pd, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'PYZZ') pyzz, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'RC') rc, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'CO') co, (select nvl(sum(case when a.reutrnorsupply_flag = '2' and a.trans_kind = '1' then -a.cost else a.cost end),0) from fin_ipb_balancepay a where a.invoice_no = t.invoice_no and a.trans_type = t.trans_type and a.pay_way = 'TCO') tco, (select a.empl_name from com_employee a where a.empl_code = t.balance_opercode) sfy, (select a.dept_name from com_department a where a.dept_code = (select b.dept_code from fin_ipr_inmaininfo b where b.inpatient_no = t.inpatient_no)) zyks, t.balance_date operdate,cd.name from fin_ipb_balancehead t inner join fin_ipr_inmaininfo fm on t.inpatient_no=fm.inpatient_no left join com_dictionary cd on cd.type='PatientType' and cd.code=fm.patient_type where t.balance_date between to_date('&dtBeginTime','yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('&dtEndTime','yyyy-mm-dd')+1 and (t.balance_opercode = '&cmbFeeOper' or '&cmbFeeOper' = 'ALL') and (t.name like '%&name%' or '&name' is null) order by t.invoice_no,t.trans_type

ReportQueryInfo.QueryFilePath: Report\门诊财务报表\爱博恩\住院结算统计设置.xml
